Summary: This object was facing west and was Enormous.. Looked like the moon
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend Nidia and I witnessed a huge object that looked like moon facing the west part of our location. I live on the 13th floor of a highrise building very close to the airport and I see planes all the time and this was definitely not a plane. This object was HUGE!!! My friend thought it was the moon at first but the moon faces east and this object was facing west and it literally vanished in front of us. We are really curious to know what this was and would like to have answers...
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around July 29th 2012
